import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import '../App.css'; import { Accordion, InputGroup, FormControl, Form, Button, Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; import timetable_data from '../data/timetable.json'; const Search = () => { const [buttonOn, setButtonState] = useState(false); const [tt_num, setTt_num] = useState(''); const [subject_name, setSubject_name] = useState(''); const [previous, setPrevious] = useState(false); const [after, setAfter] = useState(false); const [year, setYear] = useState(false); const [teacher_name, setTeacher_name] = useState(''); const [display_table, setTable] = useState(''); const [semester_option, setSemester] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { let filtered = []; if (semester_option.includes(e.target.value)) { setSemester( semester_option.filter((checkedValue) => checkedValue !== e.target.value) ); } else { setSemester([...checkedValues, e.target.value]); } filtered = timetable_data.filter(subject => { return subject.tt_num.includes('G' + tt_num) }) .filter(subject => { return subject.name.includes(subject_name) }) .filter(subject => subject.teacher.find(teacher => teacher.includes(teacher_name))) .filter(subject => { return semester_option.indexOf(subject.semester) > -1;}); if (filtered.length === 0) { setTable(

検索結果がありません

); } else { let filtered_table = filtered.map(subject => {subject.tt_num}{subject.name}{subject.teacher.map((teacher) => <>{teacher}
)}); setTable({filtered_table}
時間割番号 科目名 教員名
) } }, [tt_num, subject_name, teacher_name, previous, after, year]) return (

科目名 setSubject_name(e.target.value)} value={subject_name}>

setPrevious(previous => !previous)} /> setAfter(after => !after)} /> setYear(year => !year)} />

{display_table}
); }; export default Search;
